profile.name: Antoniel Zeferino
profile.description: I enjoy creating functional and user-centered interfaces, always striving to improve the experience and make everything more intuitive. In each project, I see an opportunity to learn something new and evolve my skills. My goal is to deliver solutions that make sense for those who will use them, in a practical and efficient way, without complicating things.

skills.title: Leadership
skills.description: As vice-coordinator of the Youth Group, I developed leadership skills by managing teams, coordinating events, and effectively resolving conflicts.

skills.title: Teamwork
skills.description: I actively collaborated with various members, ensuring good communication and harmony within the group.

skills.title: Organization
skills.description: As treasurer, I was responsible for the efficient administration of financial resources, enhancing my organizational skills.

skills.title: Project Management
skills.description: I coordinated events, ensuring planning and execution of activities within deadlines and with available resources.

skills.title: Conflict Resolution
skills.description: I faced and resolved problems effectively, always seeking the best solution for the group.
